thread.title: Trump says would only join TPP if deal were substantially better than offered to Obama

author: cnbc.com
title: Trump says would only join TPP if deal were substantially better than offered to Obama
text:
offered to Obama@
April 12 (Reuters) - President Donald Trump said late on Thursday he would only consider joining the landmark Trans-Pacific Partnership trade agreement if it were a "substantially better" deal than the one offered to President Barack Obama.
"We already have bilateral deals with six of the eleven nations in TPP, and are working to make a deal with the biggest of those nations, Japan, who has hit us hard on trade for years!" he wrote on Twitter. (Reporting by Brendan O'Brien Editing by Eric Meijer)
